title: Obari
author: Obari
content: Please is there anyone from Hong Kong that can help me receive $68 in their local account and send me Bitcoin please It's very urgent.Thanks

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on February 01, 2023, 06:15:42 AMPlease is there anyone from Hong Kong that can help me receive $68 in their local account and send me Bitcoin please It's very urgent.Thanks If you don't find anybody, you can try to make a WISE account, since its multi currency you can receive HKD there as well.Hope that helps and good luck. Cheers

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: AHOYBRAUSE on February 01, 2023, 06:35:10 AMQuote from: Obari on February 01, 2023, 06:15:42 AMPlease is there anyone from Hong Kong that can help me receive $68 in their local account and send me Bitcoin please It's very urgent.Thanks If you don't find anybody, you can try to make a WISE account, since its multi currency you can receive HKD there as well.Hope that helps and good luck. CheersI tried creating the wise account but to no avail and I will be glad if anyone from Hong Kong can help me out

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on February 01, 2023, 06:15:42 AMPlease is there anyone from Hong Kong that can help me receive $68 in their local account and send me Bitcoin please It's very urgent.Thanks I suggest you go to their local board if they do have one here and place your offer. I think that would be ok to speed up your transaction but do not forget to seek the services of an escrow so as not to loose your funds or being accused wrongly.You forgot to also state the nature of the transaction for clarity because that would warrant people to come to your rescue if it is what needs urgent attention. One would want to know why they must give out their bank account details to a total foreigner whom they have no access to neither have they  met before. And lastly, i hope you will be able to be kind to whom ever comes to your rescue because i know this is strictly business and all involved must in one way or the other benefit from it no matter how small the rewards might be. Quote from: AHOYBRAUSE on February 01, 2023, 06:35:10 AMQuote from: Obari on February 01, 2023, 06:15:42 AMPlease is there anyone from Hong Kong that can help me receive $68 in their local account and send me Bitcoin please It's very urgent.Thanks If you don't find anybody, you can try to make a WISE account, since its multi currency you can receive HKD there as well.Hope that helps and good luck. CheersYet if you find it difficult to see any, you can give this a try but you would have to do your own research before engaging in the website so as not to loose your funds.

Please I've been trying to locate the Hong Kong local board but to no avail. Please can you direct me with a link to the board or thread please

comments.author: TheChin0s
comments.body: I tried to help that person to exchange, however, it is a third-party business, I do not recommend it.Maybe that user appears as a very suspicious deleted account

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: TheChin0s on February 02, 2023, 07:40:47 PMI tried to help that person to exchange, however, it is a third-party business, I do not recommend it.Maybe that user appears as a very suspicious deleted accountI never deleted my telegram accountI guess you reported it and even before then, you deleted our entire chats thrice and you also stopped responding to my chats on Whatsapp after I sent you a screenshot of the money sent (receipt).You later unblocked me and asked for my btc wallet address and I haven't received the payment yet

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on February 03, 2023, 08:26:01 AMQuote from: TheChin0s on February 02, 2023, 07:40:47 PMI tried to help that person to exchange, however, it is a third-party business, I do not recommend it.Maybe that user appears as a very suspicious deleted accountI never deleted my telegram accountI guess you reported it and even before then, you deleted our entire chats thrice and you also stopped responding to my chats on Whatsapp after I sent you a screenshot of the money sent (receipt).You later unblocked me and asked for my btc wallet address and I haven't received the payment yet From the looks, it seems you have already gotten aid and from your conversation, I hope all is going on well because I did advised you to seek an escrow with good reputation here so as to be on the safe side but with what I am reading now I hope you have not been scammed?

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on February 03, 2023, 04:48:06 PMQuote from: Obari on February 03, 2023, 08:26:01 AMQuote from: TheChin0s on February 02, 2023, 07:40:47 PMI tried to help that person to exchange, however, it is a third-party business, I do not recommend it.Maybe that user appears as a very suspicious deleted accountI never deleted my telegram accountI guess you reported it and even before then, you deleted our entire chats thrice and you also stopped responding to my chats on Whatsapp after I sent you a screenshot of the money sent (receipt).You later unblocked me and asked for my btc wallet address and I haven't received the payment yet From the looks, it seems you have already gotten aid and from your conversation, I hope all is going on well because I did advised you to seek an escrow with good reputation here so as to be on the safe side but with what I am reading now I hope you have not been scammed?I've been scammed and we already traded before your advice came in if I'm not wrong and I felt so bad because he never felt any remorse

comments.author: alertoriole
comments.body: Seems like a lot of time wasted for 68 dollars? Surely it's not worth all these posts and consideration or to try and open or use someone elses bank account for this amount of money?

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: alertoriole on February 03, 2023, 08:06:09 PMSeems like a lot of time wasted for 68 dollars? Surely it's not worth all these posts and consideration or to try and open or use someone elses bank account for this amount of money?Is $68 a no money to you?Well I don't know your country and your currency but $68 is a lot of money in my local currency and the fact that I got scammed of it worth every single post on this thread and I will be so glad if you can bless me with such amount since it's no money to you.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Why don't you just buy BTC from one of the traders here and have the $68 sent directly to them?
